message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe is of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $10000. This is a great price considering the product's worth. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I value your interest, $9500 is still a bit below what I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9750.  This is a fair price considering the product's value, and I believe it's a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose $9600 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your needs while staying within my budget.
